name: ADS Wallet
description: Chrome extension which can be used to sign ADS blockchain transactions
author: https://adshares.net/
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self'; style-src * 'unsafe-inline';font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' data:
